categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Xarovit Tovar was a male Sith Lord and Imperial Guardsman in service to the reconstituted Sith Empire. In 3637 BBY, Tovar was stationed on Yavin 4 as a commander of Imperial forces while both they and the Galactic Republic and Jedi Order acted in concert to bring an end to the newly realized threat posed by the fanatical Order of Revan cult.
